com.pump.awt.text.writing

Class WritingFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.awt.text.writing.WritingFont

  • public class WritingFont
extends java.lang.Object
    A font that can be slowly rendered stroke by stroke.

      • STYLE

        public static final ObservableProperties.Key<java.lang.String> STYLE
        Either STYLE_PLAIN or STYLE_CALLIGRAPHY

      • MEDIAN

        public static final ObservableProperties.Key<java.lang.Float> MEDIAN
        The median (as a fraction from [0-1]) of this font.

        The ascent is the distance from the baseline to the ascender line. The ascent usually represents the the height of the capital letters of the text. Some characters can extend above the ascender line.

        Note this is represented as fraction from [0,1], so to calculate the ascent in terms of pixels: multiply this value by getSize2D().

      • DESCENT

        public static final ObservableProperties.Key<java.lang.Float> DESCENT
        The descent (as a fraction from [0-1]) of this font.

        The descent is the distance from the baseline to the descender line. The descent usually represents the distance to the bottom of lower case letters like 'p'. Some characters can extend below the descender line.

        Note this is represented as fraction from [0,1], so to calculate the descent in terms of pixels: multiply this value by getSize2D().

      • LEADING

        public static final ObservableProperties.Key<java.lang.Float> LEADING
        The leading (as a fraction from [0-1]) of this font.

        The leading is the recommended distance from the bottom of the descender line to the top of the next line.

        Note this is represented as fraction from [0,1], so to calculate the leading in terms of pixels: multiply this value by getSize2D().

      • NAME

        public static final ObservableProperties.Key<java.lang.String> NAME
        The name of this font.
